channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 05:19 Driven the alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 05:19 Driven the alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further messages.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 05:07 The threat of a shelling to the Mirovskaya territorial community. Consider, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 05:07 The threat of a shelling to the Mirovskaya territorial community.
